A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was a disappointing mess. Underused characters\, unexplained powers and abilities\, inconclusive plot lines\, awkward humor\, inconsistent lore\, characterization and technology\, avoidable plot points where a whole segment in the movie wouldn't have happened if only one person would have said something in the movie. This movie is only enjoyable if you ignore all of the above.
